--- DateTime: 2021/12/30 14:13
---@class bt_ac_setSkillPlayTime
local bt_ac_setSkillPlayTime = SimpleClassUtil:class(IAction)

function bt_ac_setSkillPlayTime:initData(skillPosition)
   self._skillPosition = skillPosition
end
---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
---@param agent Agent
function bt_ac_setSkillPlayTime:doAction(blackBoard,agent,dt)
    if blackBoard and blackBoard._skillData and blackBoard._skillData[self._skillPosition] then
        blackBoard._skillData[self._skillPosition]._skill_time_play = agent._battleManager._time
    end
    return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
end

return bt_ac_setSkillPlayTime
